title: Heavy hammer
data:
- *For the weapon in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), see [heavy war hammer](/wiki/Heavy_war_hammer "Heavy war hammer").*

A **heavy hammer** is a type of melee [weapon](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") that appears in [NetHack Plus](/wiki/NetHack_Plus "NetHack Plus"), [SLASH 6](/wiki/SLASH_6 "SLASH 6"), [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It uses the [hammer](/wiki/Hammer "Hammer") skill, and is made of [metal](/wiki/Metal "Metal"). The exact properties of the heavy hammer vary depending on the variant.

[x][ ]

- SLASH'EM
- SlashTHEM

| ) [![Heavy hammer.png](/images/a/a4/Heavy_hammer.png)](/wiki/File:Heavy_hammer.png) |                                                          |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                | heavy hammer                                             |
| Appearance                                                                          | heavy hammer                                             |
| Damage vs. small                                                                    | 1d6                                                      |
| Damage vs. large                                                                    | 1d6                                                      |
| To-hit bonus                                                                        | +0                                                       |
| Weapon skill                                                                        | [hammer](/wiki/War_hammer "War hammer")                  |
| Size                                                                                | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")              |
| Base price                                                                          | 500 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                              | [60](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                              |
| Material                                                                            | [metal](/wiki/Metal "Metal")                             |

In SLASH'EM and its ancestor variants, the heavy hammer is a one-handed weapon that deals 1d6 damage to small and large monsters. It is the [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") for the [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") [Mjollnir](/wiki/Mjollnir "Mjollnir").

### Generation

Heavy hammers are not randomly generated, though they can be created by [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a war hammer.

A [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") level containing Mjollnir that is found in a game where the artifact is already generated will instead have a normal heavy hammer.

### Strategy

As a base item, the heavy hammer is only slightly stronger than a war hammer and provides relatively little advantage to Mjollnir compared to vanilla *NetHack* - most of Mjollnir's utility comes from its massive damage bonus against monsters without [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance").

| ) [![Heavy hammer.png](/images/a/a4/Heavy_hammer.png)](/wiki/File:Heavy_hammer.png) |                                                          |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                | heavy hammer                                             |
| Appearance                                                                          | heavy hammer                                             |
| Damage vs. small                                                                    | 2d8                                                      |
| Damage vs. large                                                                    | 2d10                                                     |
| To-hit bonus                                                                        | +0                                                       |
| Weapon skill                                                                        | [hammer](/wiki/War_hammer "War hammer")                  |
| Size                                                                                | [two-handed](/wiki/Two-handed "Two-handed")              |
| Base price                                                                          | 500 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                              | [125](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                            | [metal](/wiki/Metal "Metal")                             |

In SlashTHEM, the heavy hammer is a two-handed weapon that deals 2d8 damage to small monsters and 2d10 to large monsters. It is the [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") for the artifact weapons Mjollnir and [Warforger](/wiki/Warforger "Warforger").

### Generation

Heavy hammers are now randomly generated, and can be created by upgrading a war hammer as in SLASH'EM.

### Strategy

Compared to SLASH'EM, heavy hammers in SlashTHEM are much more powerful, giving artifact heavy hammers better damage against resistant monsters, but they cannot be used with [shields](/wiki/Shield "Shield") or in [twoweaponing](/wiki/Twoweapon "Twoweapon").

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Heavy hammer

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the weapon in EvilHack and Hack'EM, see heavy war hammer.

A heavy hammer is a type of melee weapon that appears in NetHack Plus, SLASH 6, SLASH'EM, and SlashTHEM. It uses the hammer skill, and is made of metal. The exact properties of the heavy hammer vary depending on the variant.

)
Name heavy hammer
Appearance heavy hammer
Damage vs. small 1d6
Damage vs. large 1d6
To-hit bonus +0
Weapon skill hammer
Size one-handed
Base price 500 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 60
Material metal

In SLASH'EM and its ancestor variants, the heavy hammer is a one-handed weapon that deals 1d6 damage to small and large monsters. It is the base item for the artifact weapon Mjollnir.

Generation

Heavy hammers are not randomly generated, though they can be created by upgrading a war hammer.

A bones level containing Mjollnir that is found in a game where the artifact is already generated will instead have a normal heavy hammer.

Strategy

As a base item, the heavy hammer is only slightly stronger than a war hammer and provides relatively little advantage to Mjollnir compared to vanilla NetHack - most of Mjollnir's utility comes from its massive damage bonus against monsters without shock resistance.

)
Name heavy hammer
Appearance heavy hammer
Damage vs. small 2d8
Damage vs. large 2d10
To-hit bonus +0
Weapon skill hammer
Size two-handed
Base price 500 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 125
Material metal

In SlashTHEM, the heavy hammer is a two-handed weapon that deals 2d8 damage to small monsters and 2d10 to large monsters. It is the base item for the artifact weapons Mjollnir and Warforger.

Generation

Heavy hammers are now randomly generated, and can be created by upgrading a war hammer as in SLASH'EM.

Strategy

Compared to SLASH'EM, heavy hammers in SlashTHEM are much more powerful, giving artifact heavy hammers better damage against resistant monsters, but they cannot be used with shields or in twoweaponing.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Heavy_hammer&oldid=151466"

As a base item, the heavy hammer is only slightly stronger than a war hammer and provides relatively little advantage to Mjollnir compared to vanilla ''NetHack'' - most of Mjollnir's utility comes from its massive damage bonus against monsters without [[shock resistance]].
